they tried to keep the students safe
Have great clubs and activites, but you have to pay for some of them.
yes, this is a good school to learn from.

they have student gatherings, and you can get signed up through the bank.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Be sure you have a place to live there is no dorms at this college. All ways bring money for food, there is no breakfast, lunch and dinner like universities or other colleges so it is pretty much every man/woman for them self. Bang for the buck YES IT IS! Am enjoying being here YES I AM! Am learning a lot YES I AM! Login to rate or flag the reviews Stefani from Hales Corners, WI 03/28/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 44 Categories Comments Campus Safety There's security patrolling daily. Greek Life None that I know of. Great for these types of students
